notes.model: OpenAI model to use (override with OPENAI_MODEL env var)
notes.reasoning: For GPT-5: effort level minimal/low/medium/high (override with OPENAI_REASONING_EFFORT env var)
notes.text: For GPT-5: verbosity level low/medium/high (override with OPENAI_TEXT_VERBOSITY env var)
notes.max_output_tokens: Maximum response length for GPT-5 (override with OPENAI_MAX_OUTPUT_TOKENS env var)
notes.fallback_note: Fallback uses GPT-4o-mini with traditional parameters (temperature, max_tokens)
